trans-unit.source: FrameworkElementAdapters is used by [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] add-ins to convert between a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref> and an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: FrameworkElementAdapters é utilizado pelo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] suplementos a conversão entre uma <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref> e um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] extends the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] add-in model to allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] to be passed between host applications and add-ins.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)]expande o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] modelo de suplemento para permitir [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] sejam transferidos entre aplicações de anfitrião e os suplementos.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] requires that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] that are passed either directly or indirectly derive from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]requer que o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] que são transmitidos um diretamente ou indiretamente derivar <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: However, add-ins and host applications are typically run in separate application domains and are, consequently, separated by an isolation boundary.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, suplementos e o anfitrião de aplicações são normalmente executadas em domínios de aplicação separada e são, por conseguinte, separadas por um limite de isolamento.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] add-in model requires the types that are passed across the isolation boundary to be remotable.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] suplemento necessita de modelo tipos que são transmitidos entre o limite de isolamento para ser remota.

trans-unit.source: A remotable type conforms to one of the following: - Implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo pode ser remota / está em conformidade com um dos seguintes:-implementa o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interface.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: - Has the <xref:System.SerializableAttribute> attribute applied.
trans-unit.target: -Tem o <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>atributo aplicado.</xref:System.SerializableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: - Derives from the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> class.
trans-unit.target: -Deriva da <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>classe.</xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> is not remotable and must be converted to a remotable type before it is passed across the isolation boundary between an add-in and a host application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>Não é remota e tem de ser convertida para um tipo pode ser remota / antes de ser transmitido entre o limite de isolamento entre um suplemento e uma aplicação anfitriã.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: For this purpose, you need to call the static <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ViewToContractAdapter%2A> method to convert the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> to an instance of the remotable <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>.
trans-unit.target: Para esta finalidade, terá de chamar o <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ViewToContractAdapter%2A>método para converter <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>para uma instância da remota <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ViewToContractAdapter%2A> estático

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract> is passed across the isolation boundary, it must be converted to a type that can be displayed by the host application or the add-in.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>é transmitido através do limite de isolamento, tem de ser convertido para um tipo que é possível apresentar a aplicação de anfitrião ou o suplemento</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the static <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ContractToViewAdapter%2A> method is called to convert an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract> to a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o estático <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ContractToViewAdapter%2A>método é denominado para converter um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>para um <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ContractToViewAdapter%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more detailed exposition of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] add-ins, see [WPF Add-Ins Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais exposition de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] suplementos, consulte [descrição geral de suplementos do WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref> that has been converted from an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref> que foi convertido de um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"></xref> that was passed across the isolation boundary between the host application and the add-in.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"> </xref> transmitido entre o limite de isolamento entre a aplicação de anfitrião e o suplemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref> that will be displayed from either the host application or add-in, depending on the direction in which the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is passed between the two.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref> que será apresentado na aplicação anfitriã ou suplemento, consoante a direção na qual o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] são transferidas entre os dois.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"></xref> that has been converted from a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"> </xref> que foi convertido de um <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref> to be passed across the isolation boundary between the host application and the add-in.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref> sejam transferidos entre o limite de isolamento entre a aplicação de anfitrião e o suplemento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"></xref> that is passed from either the host application or the add-in, depending on the direction in which the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is passed between the two.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"> </xref> que é transmitido a aplicação de anfitrião ou o suplemento, consoante a direção na qual o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] são transferidas entre os dois.

trans-unit.source: root is not the root element of a tree of elements.
trans-unit.target: rootNão é o elemento raiz de uma árvore de elementos.
